game.name: Bike Impossible Tracks Challenges
game.description:
Do you think that you can perform multiple tricky and deadly bike stunts like no one can do? Are you proud of controlling a bike like a professional on any difficult tracks? If so, checking out Bike Impossible Tracks Challenges prove to be a nice bet for you. In this brand new 3D racing challenge, you have to control a bike on a platform that is made in the sky. There are lots of dangerous obstacles to face off over this deadly platform.

Be careful when you change the track as one single mistake can cost your life and you will lose your game immediately! Hey boys! We know that you are skilled enough to ride a bike on a narrow platform somewhere in the air. Play the click button and get ready to challenge your patience and driving abilities to complete all the levels! Gear up to drive you crazy to the optimum level possible as each level comes with more challenging environment in this HTML5 bike game!

We bet you that you cannot complete the impossible tracks of this cool bike racing challenge in one go as they are more difficult than you have ever imagined. Inspired from the 3D realistic game art animation, this bike stunt simulator has everything that you need to keep you engrossed for hours. Most importantly, it is available to play online without download. So, what are you waiting for? Select your bike in the garage, go through an instant stunt training and complete all missions by showing your driving skills!
